paper_metadata.title: Life Span Approach to Human Capital Investments

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: we tested whether mothers' increased educational attainment was significantly predictive of improved socioeconomic conditions among this sample of low-income families
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: analyses of educational and economic outcomes for 432 mothers in the Chicago School Readiness Project (CSRP), a longitudinal study of families who were first surveyed when enrolling their children in the publicly funded preschool program, Head Start, in 2004-2005

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: families who were first surveyed when enrolling their children in the publicly funded preschool program, Head Start
evidence_citations.country_citation: analyses of educational and economic outcomes for 432 mothers in the Chicago School Readiness Project (CSRP)
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: a longitudinal study of families who were first surveyed when enrolling their children in the publicly funded preschool program, Head Start
